reviews.text: This restaurant is situated on the top floor of the building in very center of Belgrade with excellent views, especially when you sit next to the edge of balcony. But, except for the views, there is nothing much to offer. Food is not so good, service could be much better, if you don't have table with the view, it looks like you're in the basement not on the top of the building. During the winter months, it's cold inside and, therefore, not pleasant at all.
Great views, great service! Food could be improved
great food reasonable prices and great service
Great view, food not quite on the same level.
Great view, nice food, excellent service. Live music is superb. Two thumbs up

Delicious food and excellent service! Tonight was our first experience eating Indian cuisine. Our waiter was knowledgeable and friendly with his recommendations and my husband and I both truly enjoyed our experiences.  We would recommend this restaurant to friends and family, and we will definitely be coming back ourselves.
This place was great. We ordered Lamb chops and chicken masala? (The first menu in curry categories) and they were nice. We will visit there again definitely.
The food is amazing and the wait staff so friendly. Every time we are in Ann Arbor we eat there as no other Indian restaurant is as good. We've been eating there for 20 years.

One of the best Indian restaurants I've eaten at and I have been eating there for years. Reminds me of the nicer Indian restaurants in Great Brittan where I first tried Indian food. Authentic food served in a very nice atmosphere. The waiters are all very professional and efficient. I asked about a dish I used to order but was not on the menu now and the waiter said they would make it for me... Chicken Hyderabadi (not sure I spelled that right) delicious! I'll back when I'm in town again.

The food is delicious in every word possible! I went with my mom, and she's usually picky when it comes to food, but she absolutely loved their food. Our waiter was the best! The prices are not that bad. The service was good, a man in a suit (I believe the owner) came to our to check up on us. All in all, it was a great first experience.
